name: snowflake-runsql-action
description: GitHub Action that executes arbitrary SQL against Snowflake using the shared common library

scripts.bundle: ncc build lib/snowflake-runsql.js -o dist && mv dist/index.js dist/snowflake-runsql.js && if [ -f dist/index.js.map ]; then mv dist/index.js.map dist/snowflake-runsql.js.map; fi
scripts.test: echo "No tests yet - add integration tests with act or Jest" && exit 0
